00026 class FMKWayGainMgr4
00027 {
00028   typedef GNode Vertex;
00029   typedef GBPQueue<Vertex> VertexPQ;
00030   typedef GBPQueueCursor<Vertex> VertexPQCur;
00031 
00032   static const unsigned int _M = 64;  
00034 public:
00036   FMKWayGainMgr4(const FMParam& param);
00037 
00039   void init(const std::vector<unsigned char>& part, std::vector<short>* gain);
00040 
00041 
00044   Vertex* select(FMMoveInfo& moveInfo,
00045                  const std::vector<unsigned char>& part,
00046                  KWayConstrMgr3& constrMgr);
00047 
00049   int getGain(const FMMoveInfo& mInfo) const
00050   {
00051     const unsigned int toPart = mInfo._toPart;
00052     const unsigned int fromPart = mInfo._fromPart;
00053     const Vertex& v = _vertexArray[toPart][mInfo._i_v];
00054     return _gainBucket[fromPart][toPart].getKey(v);
00055   }
00056 
00057 
00060   void updateMove(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo,
00061                   const short* = 0)      
00062   {
00063     const unsigned int fromPart = moveInfo._fromPart;
00064     const unsigned int i_v = moveInfo._i_v;
00065     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); k++) {
00066       if (fromPart == k) continue;
00067       _gainBucket[fromPart][k].detach(_vertexArray[k][i_v]);
00068     }
00069   }
00070 
00071 
00073   void updateNeighbor(unsigned int whichPart,  
00074                       unsigned int i_w,    
00075                       const short* deltaGain)  
00076   {
00077     if (_cellList[i_w].isLocked()) return;
00078     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); k++) {
00079       if (k == whichPart) continue;
00080       _gainBucket[whichPart][k].modifyKeyLIFOBy(_vertexArray[k][i_w], 
00081                                                 deltaGain[k]);
00082     }
00083   }
00084 
00085 
00087   void pushBack(unsigned int whichPart, unsigned int i_w, const short* gain)
00088   {
00089     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); k++) {
00090       if (whichPart == k) continue;
00091       _gainBucket[whichPart][k].pushBack(_vertexArray[k][i_w], gain[k]);
00092     }
00093   }
00094 
00095   
00097   void updateGain(const std::vector<unsigned char>& part, 
00098                   std::vector<short>* gain
00099                   )
00100   {
00101     init(part, gain);
00102   }
00103 
00104 
00105 protected:
00107   unsigned int getNumPartitions() const { return _K; }
00108 
00109 protected:
00110   Netlist&       _H;                      
00111   unsigned int   _K;                      
00112   VertexPQ       _gainBucket[_M][_M];     
00113   VertexPQCur    _gainBucketCur[_M][_M];  
00114   std::vector<Vertex> _vertexArray[_M];   
00115   Cell* const    _cellList;               
00116 };
